text:
e="preserve">Srichand Parmanand Hinduja (born 28 November 1935) is an Indian-born British billionaire business magnate, investor, and philanthropist. He is the primary shareholder and chairman of Hinduja Group of companies.
As of May 2020, together with his brother Gopichand he is the UK's second richest man. Since the 1990s, he has been consistently ranked among the UK and Asia's richest people.
